content.detailedDescription: On the way home from st. louis at about 10 p.M., my friend cathy and i were driving south on hwy 61 between herculaneum and crystal city with the top of my convertible down.  out of nowhere, ahead of us in the sky heading from east to west was a green fireball with a red tail.  it traveled very fast, perhaps like an item entering the atmosphere, but usually things that fall from the sky do not have this type of coloring.  usually they are just the color of light.  this was definitely green with a red tail, and it was moving fast.  we looked to the west, expecting to see it hit or to see a flash, and saw nothing.  we were not drinking, and are both 50 years old with good careers.  cathy thought it looked closer than i did.  she thought it was closer to the ground, just over our heads.  i didn't think it did.
content.summary: Green fireball with red tail going through sky to earth

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside facing the street on my proch which is on the side of my home seens the house is sideways on a hill across a cemetary.
it was night i was feeling very, very sad just looking up at the sky, out of a cloud a white round sphere came out it then began to slowly cum down hovering over in front of me, i began to see details spnning outer right spinning iner left not completly clear it was covered in a white glow fog like with some flashing within it, i wondered calmly do i call the police? who do you call?? the way i was feeling i didn't care i just stayed there looking, waiting? it then went to the right slowly then fast i could not see it anymore my neighbors trees blocked my view i got up to see if i could still see, i wasn't sad anymore i was happy "wow" what a sight!
i told two friends the next day they laughed
content.summary: Came out of a cloud white circle hovering came slowly closer got to where i could see more detail spinning outer right inner left.

content.detailedDescription:
i went night fishing  on kentucky lake. it was a very clear night and i saw a bright white light travel across the sky quickly and quietly from northwest to the southeast. another object of the same appearance rose up  and met it  from the east and they traveled together until out of sight. i have seen plenty of planes and helicopters and the usually have blinking lights and red and green lights. these were solid lights that were just white and did not blink. they also moved faster than planes and made no sound.
   i also noticed two bright streaks across the sky that were moving horizontally they looked like falling stars moving sideways from west to east.
content.summary: A solid white light moved silently and quickly across the horizon and was met by another who moved together

content.detailedDescription: On the last night of our vacation we went outside and i noticed an orange object moving towards us from the south, i pointed it out to my husband, we watched it for a minute then called to my brother in the house he called to our kids to come out so this didn't happen too fast.  i would have to describe the shape as round to oval and the light it emitted was definitely orange.  the center of it had solid color whereas the outer area appeared diaphanous and pulsing a bit, this effect went away when the object was directly above and as it went away to the north with the shape becoming smaller and round till it was just a dot of orange the size of a star.  when we first spotted it coming towards us from the south, the shape was very large--the size of the head of a golf tee held at arms length.  the object would have been traveling along the eastern coast of lake michigan.  it moved steadily as a plane would but looked nothing at all like the lights of a plane and it made no noise.  we were hoping that others had seen it and reported it, we haven't seen anything in the news that would explain it, but we are home in pa now so if others in mi saw it and are reporting on it, we won't know.  i wish that we had tried to get a picture of it, as the event lasted several minutes but i just didn't want to stop watching it.
content.summary: Orange object moving north slowly and silently

content.detailedDescription:
We live in west roseville near the fairgrounds. me and my wife and kids were enjoying the hot weather in our swimming pool. at approximately 7:40pm pst i noticed an airplane flying from left to right (i believe southwesterly). when the plane passed by, i noticed an object hovering in the sky, completely stationary. i estimate it was about 2 miles up considering the plane that passed by was significantly lower, but i can't be sure. 

it was completely still in the air for about 10 minutes. it was white/silver in appearance and was definitely not any kind of balloon, helicopter, blimp, or airplane i have ever seen before. i grew up on air force bases so i am very familiar with all known modern aircraft. my wife and i both saw this object and she suggested i take pictures of it after watching it for about 5 or 6 minutes. i retrieved my camera, a canon rebel xti with a 28-235mm is lens. i took two pictures of the object but they did not show up for some reason. all you see when you look at the pictures is clear blue sky. after about 10 minutes the object appeared to slowly move off at an angle in a northwesterly direction. 

i don't know what the object was. my wife doesn't know what it was.

however, we're pretty sure what it wasn't.

if anyone else saw this object, please let me know. i waited a week to report this to see if anyone else made a report on it.
content.summary: It looked like it had a round body with a boomerang sitting on top of it.

content.detailedDescription:
Murrysville: june 30, 2009, sighting between 11:00 - 11:05 pm

i was in murrysville at my sister's house (i live in montrose, colorado) visiting.  even though she was at her river house, i decided to stay at her house in murrysville because my lunch date the following day was close to it.

my 14 year old daughter and i decided to sleep in her great room on her l-shaped couch because she was hoping to see a ufo like her aunt had been talking about.

it was approx. 10:45 when we both were talking about which window my sister had been seeing the most ufos from.  it was the front one that's 25 feet alpine style wall of windows facing the valley.  so my daughter propped up the pillows and was staring out the window (with disbelief that ufos actually fly by this house). the cat jumped up next to her, and as it was petting it, the cat excited jump down and ran around the living room smacking into the bird cage.  as that was happening, my daughter sat straight up and yelled, "waaaaaa! what the heck was that!"  "mom, did you see that!!" i was facing the wrong direction so didn't get to see it.

"mom, i don't know what that was! it was a big bright orange-ish/red light that just shot across the sky" she indicated from right to left, horizonally, which would be w to e or ene approx. above the treeline.  she could not tell the shape, however, because of the high rate of speed it zipped across, appearing like a streak the size of a golf ball, held at arm's length.

she said, "mom, did you hear it?"  and i said, "what, did it make a noise?" 
and she said, "yeah!  it sounded kinda like when someone shoots a firework with a whizzing sound".
but it must have been not that loud because i couldn't hear it above laughing at the cat's antics.
(her young ears are better than my 40 year old ones, though).  when my sister played back her ir daytime ufo video june 13, 2009, with the sound (on youtube channel:  seeingufospa), she said that was the exact sound it made.

then, she said, "mom, it was the coolest thing...It had to have been a ufo! you got to stay up with me because i'm sure another one is going to fly by soon.  i just know it will!"

she sat there with such excitement, like she had just drunk 3 energy drinks waiting for it to happen again, but it never came back and we fell asleep.

when we told my sister the next day,  she hugged and told my daughter, "welcome to the ufo seer's club!"  she's estatic that someone else outside the immediate family was witness to a sighting.

she's afraid people will think she's a kook and doesn't want to tell anyone about it.
i have to admit, that before this, i had reservations about all the sightings my sister had told me about, not because she makes things up, but because i seemed so unbelievable that so many could be seen in one area.  i haven't seen any yet in colorado, although your site lists several reports. i'm so jealous that i didn't get to see it.   i will definately start looking at the skies with more regularity now.
content.summary: Murrysville: bright red light whizzed fast horizonally across window

content.detailedDescription:
I went down to my neighborhood beach on candlewood lake a couple years back, as i would most nights at the time.  just looking at stars, and beyond them...Wondering big things.  i walked out to the end of the boat docks, where the best view of the universe is ( floating on water at the end of a dock)  something strange started happening a few minutes after i got down to the end of the dock.  i started feeling like something with me.  but not physically.  it was the strangest feeling i've ever had and i can't really remember what it was like.  i can't really describe it, except that it was like someone was talking to me...But without speaking.   it wasn't really saying anything at first, aside from "this form of communication exists".  ie. talking is not the only way to communicate. 
   now, i'm not talking about voices in the head or something like that.  this was a different level of communication.  there was a communication of concepts and understandings without the use of words.    sort of like, the ultimate form of communication.  it was telling me that this form of communication was possible, that was the first concept it addressed.  the second was basically, "watch this".  and a streak of light flashed through the air, miles off in the distance north of my position where i was looking.  it did a loop faster than anything i've ever seen move, about as fast as a common house fly appears to be moving when it's right in front of your face...Which is really fast for something miles away.  the light appeared, and dissappeared, i did not watch it approach, i did not watch it fade away.  the feeling of it's telepathic presence or whatever you would call my experience of communication, left too.  and i was left with a very empty feeling.  i wonder if anyone else saw this light, early in may 2007, or if it was just me.
content.summary: Extremely fast moving light in the distance.  moved clearly in a loop, telepathic experience too.

content.detailedDescription:
On the way to carroll county airport (15 miles west !) from our 1st maryland mufon meeting, held in the 9000 block baltimore national pike, i snapped 4 shots of this. rolling road looking north at security blvd. i noticed this at a stop light. jumped out and got camera out of trunk. this object caught my attention as it was hovering. altitude est 1500-2000 feet agl. it has 4 distinct protrusions out all sides. i shot it with sony power shotsx1015 .  this was the closest first shot through windshield of car. we pulled off asap and i shot 3 more. we followed noiseless object about 3 miles north speed estimated at 30 mph. no noise. object on a straight line trajectory at times motionless consistently ascending. winds at carroll county 160* @ 5 knots. this objects trajectory was on a 330*-360* heading. as a commercial jet approached (160*-180* heading)on a divergent course (at rolling and windsor mill), object just vanished. i was passenger in front seat of vehicle and had visual contact with object at all times.
   right after our first meeting. what struck me were the protrusions (4)and motion. there is a video shot by 2 men in bahama's (youtube) almost identical.
    camp david restrictions were in effect 45 miles nnw. this object was in the outer class b veil of bwi 2500/10000
see attached pictures.
(this object's trajectory would have put it very close to our meeting area at the time. just putting that statement out there.)
   this case will be deposed by david lyle and don borton.
i am the state director for maryland mufon. therefore would prefer unbiased investigation.
content.summary: Unknown aerial vehicle

content.detailedDescription:
I'm outside at about 3:45am. i looked up in the sky and i saw two stars (the same color as stars) moving in unison one following the other. they were traveling south to north almost exactly. they appeared very high up in the atmosphere. i thought planes, but there was no flashing lights or noise. but, the planes would be breaking faa regulations flying too closely. i thought satellites, wondering why they would put satellites following close to each other. the leading star momentarily stopped followed by the second star, then went back into motion. they could have just been gaining altitude and appeared to slow down or stop from my vantage point. they remained the same distance apart. i thought they almost appeared to be one object. the stars proceeded together just out of my view when it appeared that search lights on the objects went off like you would see at some grand opening event. at that same time they were gone. what happened next truly amazed me. a shooting star crossed over horizontally in front of my view no more than 1000 feet off the ground. i thought this shooting star could be a light bug, but it zoomed across about 100 feet in a split second faster than any light bug i've seen.

i don't know what i observed, but it was odd. i've never seen aircraft flying so close together. if they were military they made no noise.
content.summary: 2 star like objects following each other

content.detailedDescription: We were camping out in the middle of nowhere, no one around for miles, we were standing around the truck talkin, my dad had a camara around his chest when a flash hit my chest and face, i thought it was my dad taking a picture of me, but he denied that he did, that kid of scared me, so i leaned up against the truck looking out at the city in the distance, when i saw the light again, i looked right into the beam, it hit me and only me,it was bluish in color, at the time of the flash there was a "clicking" noise, the light was about 20-30 feet hight, but it was like 1-200 yards out so it could have been higher, it was so bright that it was like lookin into the sun for a short amount of time. for the whole weekend, i felt like i wasnt alone. it truly creeped me out. - we are located between edwards afb and china lake afb
content.summary: It was a bright beam of light

content.detailedDescription:
Aliens make people do whatever they want so they made me want to go to my roof to look the stars and then a spaceship appeared about 984 feet of height and then turned into a little cloud and the cloud entered in another bigger cloud that was there. there was no wind. the clouds were still. and i have seen a lot of ufos but i dont want to tell about them. they know where i am constantly and they make me signals to know that. and probably they are watching you right now if you are reading this. this is not a joke and i am not crazy. i just want that people knows that they are controlling us but they do it in a way that we dont realize that they are controlling us. i first saw it because a noticed something moving. and i didnt like it because i dont want aliens to bother me but they have been bothering me all my life. i have seen lights like if they were stars of all colors. and cigar shape with feet althought it seems strange that shape but i have seen a shape transform into another shape so they can change the shape like the bad terminator of terminator 2.
i dont know what is the use of the reports but here is one of mine.
and me and a lot of friends when we were 13 years old saw an oval shaped ufo flying about 900 feet or less of height about 1 minute long. and it was transparent like the film of arnold schwarzenegger predator. like a camaleon, the ufo a mean. this sighting was in 1995 on august but i am not sure of the month. and was during the day. it seemed like if there was a gigantic laser flying through the sky of valencia(spain) and that is my story. i know there is a lot of people that is crazy and like to tell lies. but i am not one of those. and i want to tell you something they control the bodies of the people i suppose they do with a very advanced technology machines or whatever. and they are closer than you think, they act strange, i suppose they would have laws like dont interact humans in a form that they notice it but they are with us since the beginning of time. i have seen how they control machines, computers, cars, and they can teletransport things althought it seems incredible.
but i could be wrong, maybe they made me see appear things and might they were there before and didnt let me see them at first and then they let me see them. maybe they dont teletransport things, but that is what i have seen. i have seen things appearing of nothing, cars included. you can thing that i am crazy but they are watching you for sure, believe me.

i dont want you to be tired of reading so, bye. by the way i dont want to take photos althought if i wanted i would have a lot. bye.
content.summary: A spaceship turns into a cloud

content.detailedDescription: The ufo tonight seems triangular bright light in middle possibly red/orange. lighter lights on edges hovering. also hovering in circles. seen at my familys house on 3200 e rd in chebanse/clifton. in sky towards the south hovering high, stopped many times before. once up close and confirmed that one was triangular. started seeing it last fall of 08 or before. honestly we look for it. but none of them wanted to report it. so i am! dont know who else to call about it. sometimes seen around 8:30 pm.
content.summary: Triangular with bright lights

content.detailedDescription:
It was dark and i was leaving my house to meet w/ friends.  as i walked onto the drive to my car something caught my eye.  i turned to the right and saw a rotating bright white ball of light w/ red, blue and green lights.  it appeared as though it was rolling up hill just above the treeline on the property next to ours, northwest to southeast.  it moved quickly and then it was out of my sight line.  it was the size of a basketball from my vantage point.  there was absolutely no sound from it.  i was stunned but quite excited .. i just stood there questioning whether i had really just witnessed it and desperately wanted it to come back.  this week i read another report from pa and they described something very similar to what i saw.  i now feel more confident to report this and that my eyes and mind weren't playing tricks on me!  

i don't know if this has anything to do with what i saw but our neighbors tree came crashing down in the back yard sometime in early june.  i called my neighbor to report it since they were away.  i remember thinking it had died rather quickly and it seemed to be in the same location where i first caught sight of this object before it rolled out of view.  in the past month, we also have had a maple tree that is dying and needs to be taken down.  it seems it lost leaves at the top this spring and is dying down from the top instead of up from the trunk. our property is heavily wooded w/ an easement that runs along the expressway.
content.summary: Round bright white w/ red, blue and green lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving down route 60 near the intersection of 199 where busch gardens comes into view.  looking up to see an object traveling very slowly with a 3/4 moon visable in the background and not a cloud in the sky.  watched it move east over interstate 64 and over navy supply base and york river.   must have been at medium altitude of about 2000 feet. average size of jumbo jet without wings and no sound.  single cylinder, white and shiny with a broad light (spot light) in the bow/front that moved and gave the image of multiple lights at once.  it was bright daylight but the broad light was intense almost like a mirror reflector.  by the time i parked with camera in hand, it had moved out of sight.

i was a busy street, busch gardens was packed.  someone else must have seen it, notice it, questioned it.
content.summary: Slow moving white cigar shaped above busch gardens moving slowly

content.detailedDescription:
Two balls (red) coparse in the sky, equally spaced. still for a minute, they do not move, nearly moon. increase in intensity of light becomes very bright as the moon 
then, they move slowly and dissolve in a southerly direction at about 20 km away, first fell in intensity light, bright back then.
no light position. no aircraft or balloon
when they were above us you could see that the ball of fire was surrounded by a ring and the center was brighter.
content.summary: 2 light ball first still and after moove and dissolve into sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was star gazing in my yard, as i often do. i noticed a very bright light to the south west, just east of the sierra nevada mountains. i grabbed my binoculars (10x50) and steadied myself across the hood of my truck to get a better look at the light. it just hung in the sky, not moving at all. it was partly cloudy and the moon was out, about half a moon. this light was much brighter than the moon or any other object in the sky. i brought the binoculars into the house with me to show my wife, through the window. as i pulled up my "night sky" program on the computer, to check for a possible planet that was clearly visable (and large looking). i looked out the unobstructed window through my binocs and watched the bright white "ball" vanish right before my eyes. 
 this is the second such object i have seen in a week. i am very confident that this was no plane or satellite. i am getting ready to view the persiad meteor shower this month, and have been seeing alot of "stray" meteors here and there. my wife and i reported the same type of sighting last october, but that one was moving from nw to se. 
 i'm surprised that nobody else from my area has reported this strange "light in the sky"
 we are very close to lake tahoe, and i have to wonder if the lake has something of interest to ets.  
 i will be watching the sky closely for the next few weeks anyway, with camera at my side! hope to see more, and hope others in the area will do the same.
content.summary: Super bright white light with red twinkle effect

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside smoking a cigarette a few days ago with my step-son. i was looking up in the sky and saw a flashing light, that had red and green lines protruding from it. we both thought it was maybe our eyes messing with us, though we knew it wasn't a plane. 

well, last night, i was outside around midnight, maybe a few minutes after, before i went to bed. i saw the same exact thing, though this time i could see there was movement. the lines would protrude, and then it was gone. i thought maybe it was covered up by clouds. within a split second, it appeared, and moved in a zig zag line, and stopped. it wasn't a lot of movement, but it was very noticeable. the lights went out again. they reappeared, and the object seemed to move a bit closer towards me, and then shot back a bit. again, the lights went out, and reappeared and started moved in a small circle.  i was pretty tired, so i decided to go inside and go to bed.

knowing that i saw this same thing twice now this week, and i know of no aircraft that hover, i found this to be interesting.
content.summary: Looked like star

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were in the swimming pool for a late night swim, when i noticed lights in the sky coming over the house behind us. at first i thought it was a plane, because our house is in a flight path, but the lights making the triangular shape were bigger than a plane, you could see sky through and around them. 

they were orange, and looked extraordinarily similar to the smallest stars we could see in the sky except of course that they were moving, and fast, flying in what appeared almost like a flock of geese formation, except with two rows instead of one. i instantly pointed them out to my husband and we watched them as they passed almost directly overhead and past our house from northwest to southeast. there was no sound whatsoever either before, during or after they passed.  

as they passed one of them moved out of the v formation and away and then back into it. once we realized they were separate lights, i was afraid they might even be missiles, they were going so fast and their color was so uniform. the whole thing only lasted 20-25 seconds or so traveling from the horizon of one rooftop to the horizon of the opposite rooftop.

i've never reported anything like this before in my life. it was a truly unbelievable experience and i would love to find out what it was that we saw.
content.summary: Approx 17 orange lights in triangular pattern

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing out in the backyard, smoking a cigarette and saw what i thought was a bright star, but it looked too big for a star.  it looked like it had a smaller circle of light in the center and spikes of light all around it.  it looked like one of those sun's that children draw with a circle and the lines coming out all around it.  

i woke up my wife and had her take a picture of it. 

my wife pressed auto levels and colors came out.  it looked exactly like this without all the colors before she pressed auto levels, though.
content.summary: Round object with lines of light around it

content.detailedDescription:
I was flying home from vegas on 7/15/09.  i was taking a picture of the sunset out of the port side widow of the jet flying east from vegas to st. louis at 10:15pm when i saw three bright lights flying in a pyramidal pattern up from the horizon.  i barely had enough time to snap this picture with my blackberry phone before the lights disappeared behind the wing tip of the jet.  look just behind the left wing to view three bright lights.
these are the same three similarly configured lights i saw on 7/27/09 in utah, near the bonneville salt flats, that i reported yesterday to mufon. two sightings in two weeks? there must be heavy activity out west for this to occur twice in two weeks?
content.summary: Three lights taken by investigator, 2nd sighting in 2 weeks, while on jet, over utah, colorado?

content.detailedDescription:
I spoke with you 5 days ago today , and am definately not into having smoke blown up my ass! 
after further review of my pics. i discovered a second picture! additionally, the other odd note is there is a red and a green dot in many of the pictures along with craft. it appears as if the red dot pictured is following the craft? 
i also told you, there are many streaks of light not witnessed by me or my friend that attended this function. i was beginning to think i was losing my mind untill the second pic verified my sanity. 
 if i had the software to analyze these pics i'd do it myself without your and davenports bullshit!
so , since ya told me you were sending someone out ?? its awfull coincindental that davenport and i played e-tag shortly after your call? 
 so, i may not get far but i am continuing my own investigation..

personal note: ya know, i rarely get out to many functions due to a fucked up back for the last 17 years! i dont need this bs as i have enough of my own probs. 

if i do find anything out you guys will be the last to know ! i hope your not funded by the tax payer in any way shape or form either! i will notify the proper authorities accordingly!

           mark c. zawko
           n2maf
           mastermcz7@aol.Com 

(as far as the release on the bottom, if it isnt someone "in the know" ??? i dont want some fuckstick coming here!!)

when my investigations are done my reports on you and davenport will be filed.
content.summary: Follow-up 4 -  last one period!

content.detailedDescription: On my way home from work spotted object that grabbed my att. had been rainy and overcast all day and sky was clearing in the eastern sky still some clouds where i was and thought maybe what i saw was a plane coming in to littlerock airport as they come in lower when weather is rainy or overcast. i was just down the street from my house when i could not stop looking at this object. i stopped in the road to keep looking when i noticed the object was capsull shaped sideways. it was orange on top half white on bottom half and seemed fuzzy. it was close to me and seemed to be floating like a balloon butt very steady. it kept coming my way then stopped and reversed direction. i tried to think maybe it was a hellicopter or something i could make sense of but it just seemed wrong and kind of hypnotised me. so finaly i drove like hell home to get my family to see this thing and my son came out with me honking my horn all the way up the driveway he watched it with me as it faded out in the sky and asked me what it was. i have no idea what it was and asked him what he saw and he said he saw an orange and white tear drop object. i have no idea what i saw butt it wasnt normal had no strobes and i just felt it was odd hard to explain the feeling i had watching this object butt it was just strange,
content.summary: Oronge top white bottom

content.detailedDescription:
At the above mentioned date and time i exited the front door of my home to run an erand. toward the northwest i saw lightning and dark storm clouds at least 10 miles distance. overhead the sky was filled with heavy cumulus and darkness was approaching. 

in the sky from the northwest a bright light caught my eye. the light was very similar in brightness to an airplane landing light except this light was orange in color. the light was approximatley 1 to 3 miles away and flying at an altitude of 1000 feet toward my house. i watched trying to make some sense of it, as it got closer the light appeared to be a fire ball flying at about the same speed of a landing jet plane except with no noise. as the light approached overhead it looked very much like an aircraft on fire except i saw no wings, running lights, or tail and there was still no sound. the fire light appeared to be at the nose of a partialy revealed structure. i called for my wife joanne to come outside and serve as a witness, it took several seconds for her to join and me and by this time the fire was out revealing only a dark object flying almost vertical now and gaining altitude fast it became nothing but a black dot against an open break in the clouds overhead. it leveled off in a east direction and disappeared over a cloud. all this happened without a sound.

northeast philadelphia airport is about 5 miles south of my house. i can see aircraft flying to and from the airport from the back yard and sometimes they fly over the house at low altitudes. i've had aircraft landing lights shining in my front window. i have lived here since 1971, i worked 12 years for a small aerospce company, been to countless air shows and spent 4 years in air force security of aircraft of all types. i never witnessed anything similar to this event in the past.

in closing i think i should mention i told this story to my neighbor across the street and he had his own story about seeing a ufo flying over levittown pa in january of this year.

sam breustedt
7/31/09
content.summary: I saw a bright orange ball of light approach the front of my house at approx 1000 ft.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were backpacking in the flat tops wilderness area and were camped at keener lake when we saw what appeared to be a bright star/satelite traveling steadily across the sky.  upon closer examination it was much larger than the brightest star (times 10) and had a spherical shape that looked like it was reflecting sunlight in the upper atmosphere or had a light of its own.  at that same time a commercial airplane flew over on a different heading at normal cruise altitude and it did not reflect any sunlight, so if the object was reflecting sunlight it was very high which would make it very large.  it was present for a couple of minutes as it traveled nw to se before it went below the horizon.  there was no sound associated with it, while the sound of the commercial jet was quite apparent.
content.summary: Bright spherical object traveling nw to se.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in bluffton in for a death in the family and i stepped out back to smoke about 2:45 am.

2.I looked up towards the south to look at the stars and something moving caught my attention 

3.At first i thought it was just a jet then i noticed there were 5 lights about the same brightness as the stars.I then thought it was a flock of geese and the city lights were reflecting off their stomachs but the lights were moving too fast to be geese. then i thought they were miltary jets but there was no sounds of jet engines. it was very early in the morning so it was very quite.

4. there were 5 lights in a v pattern moving east to south west

5.  my first reaction was, what the heck is that, then i tried to figure out what it was, see #3. my reaction after was odd because i was trying to wrap my mind around the fact that it wasn't geese or jets. disbeleif would pretty much sum up what i felt.

6. the lights just traveled till they were out of sight. i am guessing the whole thing lasted 5-10 seconds
content.summary: 5 lights in a v pattern

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i where standing outside our work building approximately 9:00pm cdt. we saw a very strange low flying spherical object,glowing bright red/orange, the lights never blinked. we watched it from 1700 walnut kcmo and it appeared to be above the and around the at&t building. it then started to head towards the airport and we lost sight of it.

i went up to the roof to see if i could get another glimpse of the object. suddenly it was back and i snapped a couple of photos of it passing around the at&t building before heading north again. its movement was not like an airplane or a helicopter. it passed right in front of the at&t building right below the sign, which is less than a mile from where i was standing. all i saw was a spherical object, very bright, glowing red and orange. my camera time lapse didn't focus quick enough to get a good shots in front of the building. its a new cannon powershot and doesn't take photos all that well at night. it took less than 2-5 seconds from the first photo, pass in front of the at&t building, and then head north. second photo is after the pass of the building. 

i thought this would have been some kind of light rotating or reflection of some sorts but kept looking around with not finding anything at all. there were several helicopters and planes we could see in the distance that did not compare to this spherical glowing object. 

my clearest photo was in the 20x digital zoom. 12.1 megapixel.
content.summary: Glowing red/orange ufo.

content.detailedDescription: It was freeky!!!
content.summary: It was a line with two glowing dots at the ends.

content.detailedDescription: Ok, os i was at my friends house on the fourth of july and i looked up in the sky, for no reason at all, and saw two red dots exactly parallel from each other. when i first moticed it i knew it was a ufo cause ive seen some like that on tv. it was just pretty much just drifting stright and in about a couple of minutes it just vanished. when i first saw it i was in total shock that i acualy saw a ufo and after a was still in shock and a little frightened.
content.summary: Two red dots exactly parallel from each other

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on back patio eating and listening to radio at about 7:00 pm.  while casually looking up at some beautiful wispy cirrus-type clouds in eastern sky, i notice a very bright, reflective object that seemed to appear out of nowhere, hovered in the same spot, then vanished.  it didn't drift about or seem to change position.  due to other recent events, i had my camera at the ready and took 9406 and 9408.

it seems this ufo was just below or right at the level of the high clouds, maybe 30k feet?  there were no fixed-wings, contrail, or sounds associated with traditional aircraft.  i also viewed it through some older binoculars, but can only use one side at a time, so it wasn't exceptionally optimal viewing.  it did not appear round or tear-dropped like a balloon.  but it's possible this could have been some type of inflatable object.  however, the sunlight really gleamed off of this thing and i couldn't detect any kind of equipment hanging down.

it also seems unlikely that a balloon would just appear from nowhere, then vanish the same way.  it didn't drift at all for the 7 minutes i viewed it.  the nws in valley, ne releases weather balloons at 6am and 6pm every day, but the winds were very calm that day/night, so it's hard to believe it would have ended up above central omaha at that time.  they also expand to about 20 ft. in diameter before popping and it seems illogical that one could see that small an object at that altitude from the ground.

finally, about 15 minutes later the object in 9411 traversed the sky in about the same area from w to e.  i also took 5 or 6 pics of jets that same night and anything that high had contrails.  this one clearly did not.  nor was there any noise from it.  when zooming in on the picture, it almost appears convex and not linear as a jet airliner would appear.  the motion was also very smooth, but arced.  if this was a jet, why wouldn't it have also had a contrail?


email jbr3adventures@yahoo.Com with any comments.
content.summary: Shimmering silver-mettalic ufo hovers at 20-30k feet, then vanishes

content.detailedDescription: I was at john reed rd going to gumbys head when i saw this really bright object. at first, i was thinking it was a star because it was not moving, but i noticed that this was 3 lights together. i could see for approximately 5 minutes, then it simply disappeared without movement or sound. it was not an airplane. i can say because i worked 5 years in a airport when i was in the air force.
content.summary: Object with 3 yellow lights over horseneck beach
